resources.string: This game is like sudoku, but with hexagons instead of squares. Tap on a hexagon to change the number. You win if you manage to fill all the hexagons such that …
… there are only different numbers in every group with a different color …
… only different numbers in the direction of this red line …
… and only different numbers in the direction of this red line …
… aaand only different numbers in the direction of this line.

This app showcases a variant of sudoku that makes use of hexagons instead of squares. It is made by a student of computer science at NTNU, Norway. The idea for this game came about while I was thinking about sudoku\'s, after having watched CGP Grey\'s video "Hexagons are the Bestagons". Later I found out the concept (of course) already existed, but it was not implemented in an actual game before. Which meant I had fun developing my own algorithms for solving and generating new hexudoku\'s, although it took several tries with different concepts.
